subsection.name: Example PDF Files
subsection.p:
The following files have been created with PDFDoclet:
examples1.pdf (about 500 KB)
examples2.pdf (about 900 KB)
examples3.pdf (about 90 KB)
jdk14.pdf (JDK 1.4 API, about 70 MB)

subsection.name: Screenshots
subsection.p:
For people who don't have an Acrobat Reader availble on the system they are using when reading this, there are a few GIF-Snapshots from these PDFs available. They give a basic idea what the PDFs may look like.
A doc page example.
An example of a doc with custom fonts.
A custom overview with images etc.
A generated, simple title page.
A look at the bookmark structure.
An appendix page imported from an external PDF file.
The index page.
